articles.author: Mira Patel
articles.title: From support to Israel, youth in America are making a generation shift to pro-Palestine thinking - The Indian Express
articles.description: For young Americans, the conflict between Israel and Palestine can be viewed through the lens of Israel’s dominant military advantage, shifts in domestic American politics and liberal college ecosystems.

articles.title: Vaccinations' lag in South a US worry - Northwest Arkansas Democrat-Gazette
articles.description: Almost half of Americans have received at least one dose of a covid-19 vaccine. But the U.S. vaccination story varies widely across regions, with New England surging ahead of the national average and much of the South lagging far behind.

articles.title: China crackdown forces crypto mining operators to end operations - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: After Friday’s crackdown, several firms said they are looking to move their business overseas, especially North America.
